title: CALENDAR
subTitle: Discover the events that you cannot miss.

events.title: Harvests 2023 Aguascalientes
events.text: From August 24 to September 17, the Aguascalientes Wine Route 2023 will open its doors for visitors to immerse themselves in a universe of flavors, aromas, and natural landscapes.

events.title: SALTILLO RODEO
events.text: Get ready for the Rodeo Saltillo Expogan & Fest 2023! üêé See you from September 22 to 24 in the most cowboy city in Mexico. üá≤üáΩ Pull up jeans!

events.title: The Bread of the Catrina.
events.text: Live the bakery and gastronomic experience of Tecate together with the celebration of the day of the dead.

events.title: Full Moon Festival Loreto 2023
events.text: Week dedicated to yoga, wellness and meditation in the Magic Town of Loreto.

events.title: All Saints Fair
events.text: Colima State Fair with gastronomy, mechanical games, exhibitions, concerts, and more.

events.title: 12 tabasco chocolate festival
events.text: Mexico was the first country to cultivate cocoa. Attend the traditional festival that celebrates this pride, from November 15 to 19 in Tabasco.

events.title: Skulls Festival, Aguascalientes
events.text: The Skulls Festival is one of the most important attractions in Aguascalientes. Year after year, at the end of October and the beginning of November, the city becomes a picturesque celebration of the deceased that has various surprises prepared for you.

events.title: Cultural Festival of the Skulls
events.text: Festival where our traditions around the garbancera catrina and its creator Jos√© Guadalupe Posada stand out.

events.title: Sprint Triathlon Loreto
events.text: Swim, run and pedal in the Magic Town of Loreto.

events.title: Sea ‚Äã‚Äãto sea
events.text: Sport event foot race cross country 102 km.

events.title: Campeche Historical Festival
events.text: The International Festival of the Historic Center of Campeche, whose eighteenth edition will take place from December 8 to 21, will offer more than 50 cultural activities, including music, dance, theater, visual arts and book presentations.
